mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mm_m_pub (id, pub_set, provider_id, ext_id, int_id, version, stability, operator_id, begin_time) VALUES (#{id}, #{pubSet}, #{providerId}, #{extId}, #{intId}, #{version}, #{stability}, #{operatorId}, #{createdAt})
mapper.select: SELECT id, pub_set, provider_id, ext_id, int_id, version, stability, operator_id, begin_time FROM mm_m_pub WHERE pub_ext_id = #{pubExtId} AND end_time IS NULL
SELECT DISTINCT(provider_id) FROM mm_m_pub WHERE provider_id LIKE #{query_pattern} ORDER BY provider_id ASC

SELECT mext.id, mpub.provider_id, mext.group, mext.name, mpub.operator_id, mpub.begin_time FROM mm_m_pub mpub, mm_m_ext mext WHERE mpub.ext_id = mext.id AND mext.`group` LIKE #{query_pattern} AND mpub.end_time IS NULL GROUP BY mpub.provider_id, mext.group, mext.name

SELECT mpub.id, mpub.pub_set, mpub.provider_id, mpub.ext_id, mpub.int_id, mpub.version, mpub.stability, mpub.operator_id, mpub.begin_time FROM mm_m_pub mpub, mm_m_ext mext WHERE mpub.ext_id = mext.id AND mpub.pub_set = #{pubSet} AND mpub.end_time IS NULL AND mext.name = 'root' GROUP BY mpub.pub_set

SELECT mpub.id, mpub.pub_set, mpub.int_id, mpub.version, mpub.stability, mpub.begin_time FROM mm_m_pub mpub, mm_m_ext mext WHERE mpub.ext_id = mext.id AND mpub.ext_id = #{extId} AND mpub.end_time IS NULL GROUP BY mpub.pub_set
